location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.1474 of 1852 from Arthur Malet, Chief Secretary to the Government Bombay, to Captain Arnold Kemball, Assistant Resident in Charge, Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: Acknowledgment of Hennell's letter H (ff 87-88), stating that the Governor in Council has sanctioned the disbursement of 1018 rupees, 6 annas and 10 pies, on account of the annual presents for the Arab chiefs.
